H0.text: what country did benito mussolini govern. Germany

H1.text: what country did benito mussolini govern. Spain

H2.text: what country did benito mussolini govern. Austria

H3.text: what country did benito mussolini govern. Italy

A4.text: Benito Amilcare Andrea Mussolini was the dictator of Italy during the Fascist period, which lasted from the March on Rome in 1922 until his overthrow in 1943.

A5.text: He served as Prime Minister of Italy from 1922, later adopting the title Duce ('leader') of Italian fascism.
